content.description: Start low and left on apposing side pulls and follow obvious features up and right. Crux is a bit of a puzzle and probably will be different for everyone. Let me know if this has been done before if you have the info.
content.location: Directly in line with the giant tree at the base. Landing is ok.

content.description: How many times have you been to the Zoo and wanted to climb all those walls in the various exhibits? This highball wall looks just like those found in a Zoo. Full disclaimer, I really have no idea if there has been any climbing on this wall in the past or if any lines had been established. Please let me know if you have info. The rock is just as good as the rest of the area and the possible climbs should absolutely be recognized for a strong addition.
